result.arabic_text: لِّتُؤۡمِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَتُعَزِّرُوهُ وَتُوَقِّرُوهُۚ وَتُسَبِّحُوهُ بُكۡرَةٗ وَأَصِيلًا
result.translation: No kugira ngo (mwe abantu) mwemere Allah n’Intumwa ye, mumutere inkunga, mumwubahe, mumuhe agaciro akwiye, kandi munasingize (Allah) mu gitondo na nimugoroba.
